narrative.narrative: Uzbekistan Airways is the national airline of Uzbekistan and makes it hub as Tashkent. They fly to 58 destinations. It's current fleet consists of 37 planes which include 10 A320s,9 767's,6 757's,7 Il-114's,and 3 Avro RJ85's. They use 2 A300's as freighters and also have 2 787's on order.
